statements: CREATE TABLE WasteManagement (id INT PRIMARY KEY, waste_type VARCHAR(255), disposal_method VARCHAR(255), disposal_location VARCHAR(255))
CREATE TABLE waste_collection (id INT PRIMARY KEY, location VARCHAR(255), collection_date DATE);
CREATE TABLE waste_disposal (id INT PRIMARY KEY, location VARCHAR(255), disposal_date DATE);
CREATE TABLE waste_collection (collection_id INT PRIMARY KEY, collection_date DATE, collection_location VARCHAR(100), collection_weight DECIMAL(10, 2)
CREATE TABLE waste_bins (bin_id INT PRIMARY KEY, bin_location VARCHAR(100), bin_capacity DECIMAL(10, 2), bin_status VARCHAR(50)
CREATE TABLE waste_disposal (disposal_id INT PRIMARY KEY, disposal_location VARCHAR(100), disposal_date DATE, disposed_weight DECIMAL(10, 2)
CREATE TABLE waste_collection_locations (location_id INT PRIMARY KEY, location_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, location_address VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, collection_day VARCHAR(10);

CREATE TABLE waste_collection_schedule (schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY, location_id INT REFERENCES waste_collection_locations(location_id) ON DELETE CASCADE, collection_time TIME NOT NULL, collection_frequency VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL);
CREATE TABLE waste_bin_types (bin_type_id INT PRIMARY KEY, bin_type_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, capacity DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL);
